review: I love this thing.  Seriously.  We've used our Blu-ray player, a first-generation Roku, our Wii, and our computer to stream content to our TV, but this is my favorite device to do so.  Our Sony blu-ray player had a terrible netflix interface that I kept hoping in vain they'd update since we dropped cable a couple years ago.  Our Wii is connected in standard definition, so it's not ideal either.  The Roku was good while it lasted, but it eventually died.  The Amazon Fire TV has been our Go-to content device since we got it, and I prefer it to the Roku.  It's more flexible (can run some android apps) and a nicer interface.
